text:
AIDS awareness rally was organised by the Health Department and Pondicherry AIDS Control and Prevention Society here on Thursday. Manick Deepan, Additional Collector, flagged off the rally in which students and NSS volunteers participated.

— Special Correspondent

Awareness programme

Under the joint auspices of the Health Department and Government College for Women, cancer awareness programme was organised at the college on Thursday. D. Parimala Devi, Dean and Special Officer of the Government Medical College and Hospital, spoke. M. Periyasamy delivered a lecture on prevention of cancer. — Special Correspondent
title: AIDS awareness rally
